argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lindslinind.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lindslinind.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | lindslinind.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | lindslinind.z | |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 5 |  | lindslinind.y | |- Y = ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) |
| 6 |  | lindslinind.g | |- G = ( f |` ( S \ { x } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp3r | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. ) ) -> f finSupp .0. ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` R ) e. _V |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. ) ) -> .0. e. _V ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_fsuppres | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. ) ) -> ( f |` ( S \ { x } ) ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl5eqbr | |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. ) ) -> G finSupp .0. ) |
